techmeme.title: Diplomats and others fear a rift between SoftBank and Naver over the ownership of messaging app Line could put stress on ties between Japan and South Korea (River Akira Davis/New York Times)

Shopify unveils AI-focused updates for merchants, including suggested replies and product categorization, and launches its AI chatbot Sidekick in early access (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Turkish grocery delivery startup Getir agrees to a restructuring that will see Mubadala lead a $250M injection and acquire control of Getir's grocery operations (Ivan Levingston/Financial Times)
